                        Tile end,
                        Tile[][] map,
                        int numberOfFrontierDirections)
        Parameters:
        frontier - - the priority queue that all the nodes get added to
        end - The player or end destination This will find the nodes around the tile this is called for Changes the parent node for if there is a better pathway
